Tyi\
(B
June 18, 1954
Mr* Parker Wheatley
to* Bill Harley
Gentst
You two, with Siegel (chairman) and me (ex officio)
arc committee appointed by Ausmus to reconnaend and
screen programs for irix Italia this year.
Will you send Sy, with copies to the rest of us,
your suggestions for entries for this? Ifm awaiting
details froia Sy now, but meanwhile hope you can think
of outstanding programs or scries we should recommend.
Cordially, in haste
Harry J, Skornia
Executive Director
HJSscp
